content: R4DW-X Air nailer Pneumatic nailer for steel tagging ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ruggedly built to withstand extreme use Fewer interruptions to reload – large capacity magazine holds up to 20 fasteners No powder cartridges needed – air-powered fastening tools save you the hassle of ordering and handling fuel for powder-actuated tools Applications Tagging steel in steelworks ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: [consumable dependent] Fastener Intake: Collated Weight: 11.9 lb.
